summary: Worker shutdown in v1.8.1 causes a ShutdownError exception that terminates Jest with exit code 1, breaking test suites. Downgrading to v1.7.4 resolves the issue.
userImpact: Tests fail entirely when using worker.shutdown() in v1.8.1, preventing developers from running test suites.
rootCause: Regression introduced in v1.8.1 related to shutdown error handling
resolutionDetails: Fixed in PR #1166, included in v1.8.2 release
